channel.title: Video tut on clients and servers by me :D [155mb - 38mins duration]
channel.description:
Download here: [code] http://cheezscape.ath.cx:8080/vidtuts/xero_vidtut1.rar [/code]
Or from RS in parts:
Part 1: [code] http://rapidshare.de/files/21633784/xerosvideotuts_1.part1.rar.html [/code] Part 2: [code] http://rapidshare.de/files/21640420/xerosvideotuts_1.part2.rar.html [/code] Part 3: [code] http://rapidshare.de/files/21640448/xerosvideotuts_1.part3.rar.html [/code] Part 4: [code] http://rapidshare.de/files/21642171/xerosvideotuts_1.part4.rar.html [/code]
I was gonna upload on megaupload but it was gonna take 4 hours so I decided to upload onto my webserver :D
This covers quite a few things for both servers and clients and will help alot more than a text tut because I'm not good at explaining things :)
[B]EDIT:[/B] If video does not play download this codec: [url=http://www.techsmith.com/download/codecs.asp]http://www.techsmith.com/download/codecs.asp[/url] <- choose tscc codec
Enjoy - xero
